Subject: Lost Love On The Horizon
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

A few shots hit around him. He looked to their origin, and saw Feline.
Instead of returning fire, he smiled at her, and turned away.
He then opened his comm link on a one way channel.
"Feline, we need to talk. Without trying to kill each other."
